description.value: You know how to keep others alive in the Gravelands' murkiest shadows. Allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of you gain the benefit of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Survivor of Desolation]. If you are a champion, this aura is a champion aura, even though you gained it from Knight Reclaimant instead of a champion feat or feature.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
